About

I'm a Computer Engineering student in Toronto, Canada passionate about operating system design, computer hardware, and online security/privacy. In my free time, I'm usually spending too much time ricing my unix setups or working on optimizing a very overkill home server.

Contact

The best way to reach me is by email at mail@kleidi.ca. Also check out my resume.

Website

This app is built with SvelteKit and TailwindCSS, and hosted by me personally. Feel free to view the source and leave a star if you'd like.
